verses.verse: O praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye nations: <S%H1471><s%> praise <S%H7623><s%> him, all <S%H3605><s%> ye people. <S%H523><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> his merciful kindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1396><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> us: and the truth <S%H571><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> endureth forever. <S%H5769><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
